pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Bias Bound Approach to Non-Parametric Inference // A novel bias-bound approach for non-parametric inference is introduced, focusing on both density and conditional expectation estimation. It constructs valid confidence intervals that account for the presence of a non-negligible bias and thus make it possible to perform inference with optimal mean squared error minimizing bandwidths. This package is based on Schennach (2020) doi:10.1093/restud/rdz065.
